solution.text:
Given points are :
A = (_{i}_,0), B = (0,_{j}_), C = (_{i}_,_{j}_)
Akash is at origin O = (0, 0)
Using the distance formula we have distance of all the tree from Akash:
\(OA = \sqrt {(_{i}_ - 0)^2 + (0 - 0)^2} = \sqrt {(_{i}_)^2 + (0)^2} = \sqrt {_{{pow(i,2)}}_ + (0)}\) = _{i}_
\(OB = \sqrt {(0 - 0)^2 + (_{j}_ - 0)^2} = \sqrt {(0)^2 + (_{j}_)^2} = \sqrt {0 + _{{pow(j,2)}}_}\) = _{j}_
\(OC = \sqrt {(_{i}_-0)^2 + (_{j}_-0)^2} = \sqrt {(-_{i}_)^2 + (_{j}_)^2} = \sqrt {_{{pow(i,2)}}_ + _{{pow(j,2)}}_} = \sqrt {_{{pow(i,2)+pow(j,2)}}_}\)
Here, \(OA \lt OB \lt OC\)
Therefore, Tree A is nearest to Akash.

content.text:
Akash went to a garden, where he saw three trees of mango at different points. If he is at origin then the trees are at A,B and C,where A = (_{i}_,0), B = (0,_{j}_), C = (_{i}_,_{j}_)
Find the tree that is nearest to him.
